entry.title: Welcome!
entry.summary: Hello, I'm deumiij. Welcome to my site, please do stay. This site has been my project all this year. And…
entry.content:
Hello, I'm deumiij. Welcome to my site, please do stay.

This site has been my project all this year. And i'm glad to announce that it's now (officially) open! There's still lots of things needed to be managed, some features to be added, and (obviously) contents to be added.

While i was aware of it, I was too focused in building the site to the point i forgot to plan it's contents. Hopefully it doesn't take too long for me to decide the content that i would like to post here. So, see you next time!
